outcome.rationale: Resident has multiple support needs: powered wheelchair user, oxygen dependent, reduced hearing and vision, requires cognitive support. Cannot self-evacuate; requires 2 persons and specialized equipment (hoist, evac chair, or rescue sheet). PEEP urgently required. Relevant resident under Residential Regs 2025.

provenance.notes: Powered wheelchair observed; resident demonstrated transfer from wheelchair to bed (requires hoist).
Oxygen concentrator observed in bedroom; resident confirmed continuous oxygen use (16 hours/day). Equipment log reviewed.
Resident self-reported reduced hearing; wears hearing aids. Requires visual alarm beacons for fire alarm.

notes: Complex assessment conducted with occupational health advisor present. Resident has care package (4 visits/day). Carer present during assessment confirmed support needs. Oxygen equipment creates additional fire risk (addressed in environmental PCFRA). PEEP coordination required with care provider and concierge team.
